entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Sanikiluaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -34.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanikiluaq Airport 06:00 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Temperature: -34.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -47
Dewpoint: -38.1°C
Wind: S 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then light snow. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending near noon then snow and blowing snow. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 23. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Windy. High minus 21. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
